website_summaries.verdict: The versatility of this pillow to be used virtually anywhere combined with its natural comfort and side pocket make it a top option.
pros: Pillow is sturdy and doesn’t lean when in use
Has soft cover that zippers around pillow, allowing users to take off and wash cover for constant freshness
Possesses convenient side pocket to store items like remote, phone, book, or e-reader
cons: Is on the firm side and takes a few uses to break in

customer_reviews.title: And within a few months they were all sloucy and in the garbage! THis is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I cant tell you how many of these things I have purchased over the years! Everywhere from Targer to Bed, Bath and Beyond...every price point. And within a few months they were all sloucy and in the garbage! THis is awesome! Still hodling up very sturdily for what it is...and I am going to purchase another one now for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-MarieTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good back support and nice soft removable cover to clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a while back and was very happy with the support and comfort of the product but when went to take cover off the first time to wash it the zipper ripped. I noticed that the made a new design with a much better zipper and more open space to remove the cover since I purchased it. I contacted the company and told them what happened and they offered to send me a new backrest with the new designed zipper. I was able to remove this cover with ease and wash and put it back on. Appreciate the good customer support!
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this backrest for a few weeks and it works very good for me. We have a deep couch that I like because of its height and firmness, but the deep puts a strain on my back when working on my tablet or computer. The backrest solved my problem. The arms aren't really big enough to rest your arms on them, it they do make it more stable. The fill is firm and so far rebounds nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Seems solid
customer_reviews.text: Boy there are a ton of these things for sale! I picked this one for its removable cover and size. It does need a day to fill out but it's not like one of those little sponge ducks you throw in a cup of water and it balloons to ten times it size. I'd say it was 90% fluffed right out of the huge shipping box. I didn't comment on durability yet as it's too new to tell. It's pretty firm so you don't get lost in it.
customer_reviews.author: the waterboy

customer_reviews.title: It works and is heavy so get it into position before using it.
customer_reviews.text: We got this as per my wife's PT's and family doctor's advice. She has been sitting on the edge of our divan to watch tv and eat lunch or dinner, looking to the right to see the tv. That has negatively impacted on her left shoulder and neck area. Now she sits down and faces the tv relaxing in the backrest. She has lunch or dinner and watches tv comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Grampa

customer_reviews.title: Firm and supportive  , has multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and supporting I choose the grey color as I like the neutral color -would blend in with other furnishings easier , the pillow was delivered in a vacum package which arrived earlier than expected. You need to open the plastic cover and shake the pillow well to get it into the right shape. The foam is dense enough to give sufficient support while sitting on the floor or bed. I use it when watching TV and reading. So far everyone in my family seems to love using it , so much so that we also ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: ARH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have to the Wake Forest ALS Center at least once a month so my wife and I spend a lot of time in hotels. We got these to make it a little more comfortable sitting in those beds and it’s made a big difference. These are very comfortable and very well made. Being able to wash the cover was another big reason we got these. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Toni H Wilson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE PILLOWS!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these pillows!! They are the weight and size that will meet the needs of what we will b using them for..definitely recommend shaking them after opening (as is instructed on the plastic bag that they come in...) the pillows are of a more firm/ more solid filling when they enlarge to the final size intended for the pillow..which is perfect for what we need them for..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, firm but not rock hard.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, does as I hoped. One star deducted for personal preference: wish the seating position were a bit less vertical/ more reclined; wish the back were a bit more wedge shaped and less vertical. I add a pillow at the base of it to lean back a bit more, and that allows a bit more of a recline, not unlike the adjustable back on a lounge chair. I understand this is a personal preference, not a quality or design issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ben K

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a lightning deal. He likes to sit/lay on the floor when we watch tv and the other pillow we had similar to this didn’t have any support. This one has a lot of support, but is still soft. He especially likes that the back comes up higher than most other backrest pillows.
customer_reviews.author: A Thena

customer_reviews.title: Great backrest at reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this backrest. My only complaint is I was expecting it to be a little stiffer then it is based on other reviews. That said, it still has a much better hold then others I have tried in the past. If you are looking for something with a beanbag feel this isn't for you, but if you want a little heft to your support this backrest will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Size matters.
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions aren't accurate. See photos. Arms are supposed to be 12", they appear to be a little over 10". Height is supposed to be 21", appears to be 18". Top is supposed to be 12" wide, but only if you measure way down on the curved edges. Looks to be made for kids, not adults, as the listing implies.
customer_reviews.author: DIY

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I LOVE these when we're watching TV or reading in bed. They're really comfy and provide good support. We replaced two other ones that were not nearly as nice or supportive. I also really like that we can wash the covers.
customer_reviews.author: Slothie1

customer_reviews.title: I liked that one a lot
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar pillow several years ago. I liked that one a lot,but this methaDone pillow is my new love. I use it everywhere. Came home from working a long shift with a sore hip and back. Tried sitting on the coach to watch tv and could not get comfortable for the life of me. Then remembered my mitts and OMG what an incredible difference. Was able to watch the football game in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slipcover didn't fit the pillow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pillow and the first one I received the zipper broke. They sent me a new one with a much improved zipper so I was very happy. It is comfortable and I like having the removable cover. They are really hard to find. Thanks for making it right!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It was a tedious process that literally hurt my hands
customer_reviews.text: First thought: "What the heck?!?" I spent 30 minutes breaking up the foam to stretch it out after opening the packet. It was a tedious process that literally hurt my hands. The smell was strong, but it has since faded, and the pillow has expanded to it's maximum volume. It's stiff, but not in a bad way, and I like that the top of it goes up behind my head so I can rest it if needed.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: There was little to no chemical odor and it arrived in perfect condition. I'm very satisfied with this purchase and ...
customer_reviews.text: Thisis a well built, strong "reading pillow" that can support large and small, short and tall people. It is designed for people who need something more supportive than just a pillow to sit up in bed. Sometimes I put pillows in front of it if I just want to lay back and rest. There was little to no chemical odor and it arrived in perfect condition. I'm very satisfied with this purchase and glad I took the time to search through all the options first.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Yocom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice backrest pillow
customer_reviews.text: Very nice backrest pillow. I bought two, one for my husband and one for myself and we both love them. The little pocket in the side is nice for your phone or the tv remote. The back comes up higher than other pillows I've used, and I really like that. Very nice looking cover that comes off easily if you spill salsa on it.
customer_reviews.author: Pippi

customer_reviews.title: Far cry from 70's version!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for post op to keep head elevated! This is perfect. I'm 5'3" and sitting straight up my head is only 2" above pillow. The arm rests are perfect and extend out just enough (I got a tray as well and works perfectly together) so don't get in the way. There is a very discreet zipper in the back so cover can be washed. Material is soft and this guy is very sturdy but doesn't feel hard to lean on. Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TM Vartanian

customer_reviews.title: Its sturdy yet very soft and comfertable.
customer_reviews.text: There were so many backrests to choice from. I am so glad I found this mittaGonG backrest. it came swqished in plastic, over night it opened and is the most comfortable backrest I have ever used. I'm going to order another. Its big, soft velvet fabric and it holds up very well. Thank you mittaGonG for the well made excellent product !!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Dif

customer_reviews.title: What a nice backrest pillow
customer_reviews.text: What a nice backrest pillow! It is big, comfy with high quality material. I feel very cozy and more importantly, support, while leaning on it. My neck and back feel much more comfortable than before. The package comes in a compressed form, and it expands a lot to the original shape in a few days. A slight smell as mentioned in product description, but it's completely gone in a couple of day. Great product. Both my wife and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This is the nicest backrest pillow I have ever seen ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest backrest pillow I have ever seen. It is a big bulky but it is an absolute must for me as I am recovering from surgery but still need to be able to work from my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Beth D.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is comfortable but much smaller than I thought it would be. Maybe I misinterpreted the description but inorder for this pillow to be used properly a child would need to use it. The only reason why I did not return it is because it came vaccum sealed and after opening and allowing it to get to it's full size I did not know how I was going to get it to fit in a box.
customer_reviews.author: CIMP

customer_reviews.title: Maybe if I only used it towatch TV from bed that would be a more comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: It has taken a while for the cushioning to properly set. I think what I am not very fond of is how much of an angle that it leans back. Maybe if I only used it to watch TV from bed that would be a more comfortable position, but I usually have my laptop with me and so my head is more in a downward faced position than it is looking straight ahead while in a leaning position. It really wouldn't be such a big deal but I'm currently having to stay in an extended stay suite and their living area furniture is not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I was SCARED
customer_reviews.text: This chair pillow thing came in the smallest box, I was so worried it wouldn't puff up. And then it DIDN'T. For FIVE DAYS I left it out to puff up and then upon closer inspection online I saw that I should put it in the dryer, so I did that a couple times and it was great after that. Like any pillow it does deflate when you put pressure on it for a long time so I just pop it back into the dryer for 10 minutes every couple of hours and it works great! Pretty comfortable and soft, overall it's not a bad buy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: 1. Looks like it s a kid size. I received as a gift but gave it away to my 10 years old daughter. Too small for an adult 2. Low quality. The handle got ripped off within 2 weeks 3. Slow delivery. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kardanis

customer_reviews.title: It is nice to have
customer_reviews.text: For the occasional times you may be on vacation and the weather is bad and you don't know what or if or when, you can sit up in bed and just pick up a book , turn on a radio or a TV or it might be a sick day you dread getting out of bed .... this will help. Mostly take up space but great to use. Not for daily use, there are better but cost more. Nothing wrong with this 1 except washing is big project.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The height is nice, though
customer_reviews.text: It works, but I'm afraid it's a tad too firm for my back. I end up using it as a support to prop a pillow against. Which kind of defeats the purpose. The height is nice, though. I don't use the armrests much. I might take the stuffing out and replace it with something softer, because the shape and size of this backrest is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Get comfy!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little smaller than I thought but does the job. Good color. Don't like the way the extra neck pillow attaches with white loops. Quite comfortable. Got it for my adult son who is 5'11" and 160 pounds. That's about as big a person that could use it.
customer_reviews.author: A2

customer_reviews.title: Squishy  backrest
customer_reviews.text: I need this back rest pilliw for readung in bed. It is plush and comfortable. The feel is softer than more structured and it took 2 days to plump up after unpacking. The main thing that I dislike about the pillow is that it has the name of the pillow embroidered onto the front of the backrest and is very prominent. Please omit the Embroidered name.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: Bought to watch TV in bed. It's perfect. Not too firm and not too soft. Threw it in the dryer for 45 minutes per instructions and it was fluffed up, full and ready to use. Fabric is nice and soft. Love the little pocket. Received several days earlier than promised. Due to Corona Virus the promised shipping date was longer than normal but I got it much quicker. Came UPS, the brown truck, instead of Amazon truck. Maybe that was to get it to me faster?? I don't know, but if so, that's great service! Shipping was still free as an Amazon Prime customer. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: This is really comfortable. I got this for my wife as we ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really comfortable. I got this for my wife as we just had a new born and she needs as much rest as any new moms. This helps her breast feed, eat, lounge whenever she needs to. I sometimes take this backrest to the couch as well and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jas P

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my lady when she was preggo to get more comfortable on the couch and also to prop her up when she was working from home. she loves it and brings it where ever she is posted up in the house. back is a little low so might need a pillow for your head or neck support. pocket isnt really too much help but nice if you need to store some cornuts or something similar. cover comes off and on easy for cleaning. she is very happy with it so that makes it all worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: antonio e martinez

customer_reviews.title: Provides comfort and support for lounging
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on my couch. I sit sideways (so perpendicular to the back of the couch-I have dogs that get snuggled) and I bought this in hopes of being able to sit that way and still lounge comfortably. It works perfectly. I'm short, so it's great for me. Most of my back is supported. You must allow a few days for it to expand, then punch it to loosen the foam pieces. I let it sit a couple more days to expand again and now it is full, medium firm, and perfect for lounging against!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jo

customer_reviews.title: Adequate support of the back
customer_reviews.text: (Impression after a few months) These have grown on me somewhat. They're still the best backrests I've ever owned, but they are better than alternatives I've seen in stores and they help a lot compared to no backrest at all. I think my initial expectations may have been too high or I have grown used to them now. Rating upgraded to 3.5 stars (Initial impression that I plan to update later) Uncomfortable to use in bed for both my wife and I, despite our different heights. Provides very poor support for the upper back and pushes the lower back too far forward.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rieping

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and purchased this reading support pillow and have found it delightful. It is cute as a button and I am very happy with my purchase. The support is great and if you need them, there are side pockets for a remote or cellphone. Would not hesitate to order one again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: It arrived looking like a roll pillow
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned when I ordered it about the size. It arrived looking like a roll pillow. When it came out of the bag I was pleasantly surprised. It is definitely taller than most backrest pillows, which I like. I think using these types of pillows takes a little adjusting but I am very happy. My only negative comment would be that I wish the arms were a little more substantial. It is a "heavier" pillow which means its not all cheap foam and I love the fact I can wash the cover. Thank you mittaGonG
customer_reviews.author: CR.PA

customer_reviews.title: 7 days later...still waiting for it to "perk" up
customer_reviews.text: This backrest pillow comes compressed and rolled and, unfortunately, it seems to stay that way. Directions say to leave it for 48 hours and it will fluff up. Well, 7 days later, it's still compressed and sagging. I purchased this for my daughter to have in her college dorm room, but it's unusable for it's intended purpose. Since I can no longer return it, she's outta luck and I just threw $20 something bucks in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: KIDZNURSE

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Though the pillow is well constructed with quality fabric, it has been disappointing as the upper part of the pillow tends to roll forward toward your head making it uncomfortable. The pillow is firm, which is what I wanted, but the way it sits on the bed once you lean against it makes it very uncomfortable. I've tried adding bed pillows to the front of it to see if that would support my lower back, while I leaned back head back against the upper part. Still, it was very uncomfortable. Very disappointed. I would not buy another pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Serious quality flaws
customer_reviews.text: I bought one a year ago and really liked it. This one came in a small pressure compacted roll which, the instructions said would expand in 24-48 hours. That is wrong. Over 48 hours later about 25% of the fill stayed in compacted clumps, forcing me to remove the stuffing and manually work the clumps free. When I unzipped the cover, I found the cover lining is falling apart. I won't go through the bother of returning as this is for the guest room, but if you are buying a foam backrest, look elsewhere for quality!
customer_reviews.author: Valntino

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! Once you receive it you have to put it in the dryer on fluff for 5 minutes ( it comes rolled up and vacuum sealed ) and it says 3 to 5 days to reach full expansion. The 1st day it was comfortable, but 3 days later it is AMAZING! Supportive yet firm, it has a higher nack then most for added support, and the price is right. Finally something that is made well! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Messer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my bf gifted me an xbox one for Prime Day lol...He has his own xbox in the living room, so mine is set up in the bedroom and regular pillows weren't cutting it. This is firm and tall, and it's not going to squash under you and leave you craned in an unnatural position. I'm not a small woman, tall and plus size, and this works great for me and was exactly what I wanted. Love the handle on top. Love the pouch on the side. Love that the cover comes off to wash, and love the quality for the price. If I wear this one out, I'll be getting another. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Support Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister. She sends me constant Snapchat updates about how much she loves using this in bed with the bed laptop table I got her. She says the support is perfect, it’s sized exactly as described after following the instructions letting it fully expand. This was a great purchase and am contemplating getting myself one as I work from home occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Kolberg

customer_reviews.title: best back pillow stiff upright support pillow
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and you can wash the liner Everyone loves it in our family especially with back pain attributed to Osteo Arthritis which of you have ever had can be quite debilitating so this works for students for my 87 year young mother in law and for me it’s great ans I did a lot of research before I purchased it. It is a little stiff upright so keep that in mind
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: Stuffed support to stuffed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to help me sleep sitting up after surgery. I wanted to use this on my couch. It is too wide to sit properly on couch, and one arm hangs off. It is also so stiff after the recommended post shipping smashing, it has no give at all. I will probably break into it once I can, and remove a bunch of the stuffing in the hopes it will be more flexible and actually fit my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Nydegger

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: The cover is fantastic, the filling not so much. I have waited 48 hours for the filing to "fill up" but I just think it's just how it is. Not enough fill and kind of "slumpy" definitely NOT what the picture portrays. Disappointed. Wouldn't buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Oquist

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the pillow surprised me. This is a good size.The height of the pillow is perfect -- it's thick, especially for those who want to adjust their neck. Perfect side sleep with neck or shoulder problems. Perfect price. The pillow doesn't smell and the cover is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: YvetteC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely comfortable and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday and was able to use it almost immediately. No odor, soft and so comfortable. Appears very well made for the price. Gives firm but soft support. Use it on my large recliner to watch TV and against the headboard in bed to read. Size seems adequate and although the arms are short, they five nice support at the elbows. I'm very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: toby1949

customer_reviews.title: Zero Support but Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The main issue is that it offers absolutely no support. I am a big guy (6’2”, 275 lbs), and this pillow gives way after a few minutes of leaning against it. The material is too soft and not firm enough. Excellent customer service though with refund policy and timeliness in responding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: ahhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I have to constantly run my dogs out of sitting in it but it has made my time on the day bed with them much for enjoyable. I have to put two pillows behind it to make up the space to the backrest (again.. daybed) but it is soooo much better than just another pillow or two.. I found myself waking up sitting in it the second day I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Super supportive and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this back rest/pillow ! I have a bad back and was miserable trying to get comfortable enough to watch TV This pillow came into my life and changed everything Don’t let it’s appearance fool you when it arrives or discourage you. I say it out in the cold winter sun and it poofed up pretty quickly. Could not be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Noni

customer_reviews.title: Horrible purchase! A complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: What a horrible purchase! To begin with, the pillow shows up tightly compressed big time in this package and when I take it out the inside pillow is broken up and when I finally manage to try and smooth everything out the broken pillow doesn’t even fully fit the cover. What a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I broke my ankle and was spending a significant amount of time in bed. Propping pillows wasn't working and was very uncomfortable. I bought this based on reviews and wasn't disappointed. This backrest pillow fulfilled everything I needed. Very supportive, very comfortable, and perfect for my needs. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TracyC

customer_reviews.title: I like the height
customer_reviews.text: The MittaGong was as described. I like the height, most other reading pillows are shorter. Feels very comfortable when I am reading or watching tv in bed. I am Very happy would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth r.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Backrest Around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father cause of his back and so he wouldn't have to lean so far back when he sits on my sofa. Now he gets the back support he needs and can sit up straight and his feet touch the ground when he sits. This is perfect for anyone that has short legs on a big sofa that's designed for tall people. Thick, firm cushion. And stays firm! This is the best backrest around. Its a must have for comfort and quality. and is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Sterling Priddy

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Product used for looking at TV in bed. Purchased to enable me to look at TV with comfort. This product was well made. Soft to the touch. Height was just right. Looked at several other bedrest pillows and looked at lots of reviews before selecting this one. Feel I made a very good choice. I suffer from problems with Arthritis involving my neck and this bedrest gave me lots of support for my neck. Loved the blue color. Would purchase product again.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Reading Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Removable fleece like cover. Very nice looking with embroidery. Soft but firm enough to hold it's shape. Convenient handle at the top to move & adjust easily. I needed a sitting/lying alternative while working on a laptop, reading & writing.
customer_reviews.author: GeoUtah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is not the standard cushion that you normally see...the back is high enough that you don't have to strain your neck to hold up your head...also the side arms slant downward for additional comfort depending if you want to sit straight up or kind of lounge...it has been so helpful to me since I'm supposed to be sleeping somewhat propped up...really enjoying
customer_reviews.author: lisa speach

customer_reviews.title: i love this pillow。
customer_reviews.text: Now I am 9 months pregnant. When I want to watch TV or read a book, leaning on this pillow, my back will be stretched very well and will not press my stomach. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: eling

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Good for a bad back.
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy for my bad back. Love it! I have seen photos of people having trouble with this puffing up fully. Let me tell you, I sat this in my room, in the sunshine for a couple hours. It looks just like the photo, exactly. If you do not have sun, sit it in the kitchen when you are baking or in front (not too close!!!) of your heater. The warmth really makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Generous size, soft, holds it's shape
customer_reviews.text: I slept on this for 2 weeks have facial surgery, where I had to sleep w/head elevated and on my back. It was very soft and comfortable and yet firmly supportive. Was great for binge-watching on Netflix too. While it does have foam particles, I haven't had to fluff it up any. Like the pocket on side arm for phone or little stuff. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Balled up!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived Balled up into a roll. I had to flatten it out so the comfort level is not all the way there.
customer_reviews.author: LovetoRead Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good choice unless you already have one. Compare the specs.
customer_reviews.text: Recovering from a knee injury, buying a new one was easier then getting help finding the one I had in storage. It is soft. And I think lighter than the one I have in storage. But the arm rests are less functional than the one in storage. Will make that one more accessible as I get older.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rychlicki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had ankle surgery and cant put weight on my one foot which means a lot of bed rest... i needed something for back support for daytime use to be able to sit comfortably up in bed and pillows were not doing a good job... This thing is perfect. Perfect size and fluffyness is firm so its back support is great--- im 5'5 and 175lbs...Best buy of the year i love this and will get a lot of use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It expanded fully after the recommended time and aire
customer_reviews.text: The support is great, its firm enough to work on my laptop a full 8 to 10 hr workday. Yet not so soft to where your neck and back hurt or where you want to fall asleep. I did not buy this to sleep! I think it's great for students to read, watch TV from bed or if your bedridden and need to work from a laptop. I had surgery on my foot and worked from home almost everyday for two months using this and it hasn't quit on me yet. I'm 5'3 and did not need the pillow attachment on top, It worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Favi Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great for breastfeeding!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for breastfeeding! My wife has been using it for a month and it has not sagged at all yet. She also tends to fall asleep upright against it during the lat night feedings and still no sag. When the baby goes back in her crib, she will often use the arm of it as a head pillow. She says it is the perfect size to not have to deal with neck strain.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Chernoff

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large and I like it a lot. I am disabled and spend a lot of time in bed. I need support to sit up and watch TV and read. I've had a few of this type of pillow and this is by far the best. I put it against my headboard and I am fully supported. I really like how tall it is. The blue is very pretty and I really like the lettering in the design
customer_reviews.author: P. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for post knee surgery
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a lifesaver. I just had knee surgery and immobile for 30 days. I was worried about being uncomfortable stuck on the couch and sitting up in bed. So comfortable and I’m able to use it in bed and on the couch with my leg propped up. Very happy I took a chance on ordering this.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this to proper myself up in bed so I can read and it works great. No more rearranging the pillows - just use this and done. I also think this will work great when cold and flu season comes along and I need to sleep a bit elevated.
customer_reviews.author: LunkTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Good for watch TV on bed
customer_reviews.text: Watching TV shows on my bed is one my favorite activities after work. But I don't feel comfortable with my pillows when I put them at back. This product solved my problem. It seems provides a very good support force at my back. Very comfortable. Small investment for not getting painful neck. You can put it elsewhere when you don't need it. I saw the complaint about the hard material. To be honest, it won't give enough supporting force if it is too soft. Strongly suggested!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Da wae

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, easy to clean backrest
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son to use in his dorm room, and he started using it right after we let it sit for a couple of days in order to let it expand. He finds it very comfortable with good support. I chose it partly because it has a removable, machine washable cover, and we got to test that after a couple of days when he had a nosebleed. We treated the stain and washed it immediately and put it through the dryer. It was as good as new! He just moved into his dorm today, and it looks like it will work really well for him.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable without too much give.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really, really freaking comfortable. I was worried when I saw it in the vacuum packaging, but like the instructions say, you have to give it a day or two to really expand. I left it in the sun for a few hours as well, and that seems to have helped. Anyways, I primarily use this when I'm playing on my laptop in bed. It sits well, and the arm rests work comfortably. It even has a side pocket that I have yet to use, but it's handy to have one there. The pillow is full without any sort of sagging or extra fabric. Overall, I am quite happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wright

customer_reviews.title: Big and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Don't be shocked when you get it,looks like a 10lbs hamburger roll,but give it 24 hours and the pillow is ready to go! Great pillow for sitting around.
customer_reviews.author: Karl J T

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this backrest
customer_reviews.text: I have been very impressed with this backrest pillow. As the insides continued to expand over the first 24-48 hours the pillow is very "full" and feels nice. Has a high quality feel to it. Being over 6 ft. tall I also like the fact that the height is 2" taller than the other pillows I was considering. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V.

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is hard, but..
customer_reviews.text: I hoped when I read complaints that the pillow was too hard, that it would be perfect for me and it was! I'm 5'2" and the top was just high enough for me comfortably sit up or recline for a nap. Recovering from abdominal surgery and lying flat was not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne F. Talley

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: It. Arrived faster than I had anticipated with the pandemic slowing things down. However, I waited for three days for the packing inside to unfluff. It never did. Not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lani Sur

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bedroom purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally purchased something for myself that I truly love it supports my back it’s soft and I turn it upside down and it fills up again!! So good I had to purchase a bed table :)
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: It's like curling up in a hug!
customer_reviews.text: I love how comfortable it is. I love the fact that there was never a chemical smell and it un-compressed right away. I am SO happy I bought it. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delayed Gratification
customer_reviews.text: You WILL be unhappy when you open the box on arrival. It is tightly shrink-wrapped and comes out of the wrapping limp and feeling understuffed. If you flumph it, it helps only a little. BUT, then, as advertised, in a day or so it fills itself out as the stuffing breathes. It is a good reading pillow. If I had a complaint, I would want the back to be higher. But it is a good looking, comfy accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Someone Else

customer_reviews.title: It's different....and I don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and it seem really filled. This one is not as filled and cost more. There are parts with no filling. If this is how their product are now, I can't recommend them. I would have been better off sticking a few pillows behind me.
customer_reviews.author: cy

customer_reviews.title: Helped Through My Recovery
customer_reviews.text: I had knee surgery that would require 6 weeks of not being able to bear weight so, lots of sitting. I ordered this to help offer support while I was recovering in bed. It has been a huge help. It is firm and comes to the top of my shoulders (I’m 5’2”) which, personally, is perfect. I’m very happy with this purchase and glad I can continue using it even after I’m mobile again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: My family loves to lounge on the floor so I wanted something that would offer decent support. This was perfect. Fluffed up great, is a little stiff but hopefully over time that will become less so. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Firm & comfy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver! I do a lot of reading and online school work in bed, so I needed a sturdy back pillow for support. This pillow is firm and the perfect size. It was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kdub

customer_reviews.title: Firm
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for firm back rest, then you will love this product, however it is not very comfortable, even with multiple bed pillows it’s still not very supportive on the lower back.
customer_reviews.author: LdyJazmne

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I was hesitant about placing an order. But, I am happy to say there was no odor at all and I did not have to "work" the pillow for it to expand. I did a little fluffing and the next day it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Haag

customer_reviews.title: Missing half the stuffing!!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my son's dorm room for reading in bed and he thought it was a joke. There is hardly any stuffing and it's completely mushy offering no support at all. He watched the video on how to puff up the foam stuffing but it is still only about half full of stuffing. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Son loves his!
customer_reviews.text: He was getting a sore back sitting in bed so we tried this. It takes a day to fully allow fill to expand. Put ours in the sun as directed. It’s wonderful- but remember to take the time to let it expand!!
customer_reviews.author: T-70-InTampa

customer_reviews.title: The is sitting against a rock
customer_reviews.text: I have serious back and neck pain and I needed to find a backrest pillow for reading and working on my laptop in bed so I ordered this pillow. The problem is that once it fills out it becomes rock hard. I wanted something softer and more comfortable and this wasn't it. It was like sitting against a rock it so I had to return it. The only other issue was that the arm rests are too small to be usable for a normal sized adult.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: Supportive Product and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This reading pillow is awesome. I love how it puffs up like magic. There was no smell issue for me. Wonderful product, I am going to buy one for my guest room. Plus the company has amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi Patterson

customer_reviews.title: after just a few months, its flat as a ...
customer_reviews.text: after just a few months, its flat as a pancake. Too late for me to return. Consider you options before getting this one.
customer_reviews.author: NeoSoul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend who loves one of these for the head of the bed. And oh my gosh I'm in love with it. Will be purchasing another! I love the fact that there is a zipper to wash the case too, that was a huge deal breaker for me! Super comfy to sit up and relax and read a book too. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Decker

customer_reviews.title: Just a little bit too firm. Better with a pillow in front
customer_reviews.text: I broke up the stuffing and then put it in the dryer with three tennis balls. The stuffing broke up nicely but it's very firm. It hasn't stopped me from using it though. I just put a pillow in front of it. I had a knee replacement and was laid up for a while. It worked out for me.
customer_reviews.author: pair

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother with this one unless you enjoy sliding having your neck pushed forward no support
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use it in bed to work on the internet but it causes my neck pain and pushes my head forward due to the lack of support( pressure on my shoulder and neck to try and stay sitting upright.t It feels overstuffed
customer_reviews.author: haikou

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Adds Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Chose to add a pillow to increase the height and support for the head. Serves the purpose of additional comfort while watching TV at night in bed. It is very comfortable and appears to be good strength so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow
customer_reviews.text: Very good pillow I like the color and the feel. Very soft and useful. Would buy again. Small pocket on the side to put your phone in. Great pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H

customer_reviews.title: All I Got is a hard, Pathetic BLOB!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awful! When I opened it, all I got was a big blob of hard, chunks of foam that never expanded to anything soft or usable. I am shocked at how bad this product turned out to be. I must have gotten a defective product, but I won't be ordering a replacement because it might not be any better the second time around.
customer_reviews.author: katrina nixon

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart at the seams
customer_reviews.text: Did not last long. The zipper broke off the cover about 3 months after my purchase. A few months after that there were small rips in the arms that eventually gave way to the mess you see in the photo. I was hoping to try to get ahold of the company but the only place they exist is on Amazon- probably a cheap Chinese company with a ridiculous markup. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Forste

customer_reviews.title: Like laying back on a slab of granite
customer_reviews.text: The material is comfortable but the pillow itself is as solid and unyielding as a rock. As others have noted, the armrests are worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Jercarjo

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who’s having surgery Thursday. Arrived in tiny shrink wrapped packaging and two days later still tiny and flat. Will be returning this week.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a nursing mom!
customer_reviews.text: I am a nursing momma of a newborn baby and needed a supportive pillow in bed for those late night feedings. This pillow is perfect. Soft, supportive, and comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ryan

product_meta.title: mittaGonG Backrest Reading Pillow with Arms Removable Cover Gray
feature_bullets: ★LARGER SIZE-20" high,12" wide at the top and 12" arm length, the pillow gives a complete support for your back and arms
★FIRM SUPPORT-High Quality Shredded Foam Padding, you can lean against it comfortably while reading, watching tv, playing video games…More supportive than usual reading pillows
★ARM SUPPORT-Thick and long arms support. Takes some weight off your shoulder and neck muscles. Helps to relieve the neck pain
★REMOVABLE COVER-Machine washable. Very easy to clean. Unlike other reading pillows, the zipper of this one is at the buttom rather than at the back, which makes it easier to take off and put on
★EASY to MOVE-With the top carry handle, you can simply move it to your bed, couch or ground

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,152 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
